character.name: Spell Caster
character.greeting: You may cast spells to defeat the enemy. forever, with no "magic" as the inhabitants of Moria consider it. 3. Mind Change: Rift Points Cost: 8 This spell allows the caster to change the mind of the one the spell is cast on. The text will let you know if it can be used and the results at the time. 4. Rift Energy Pulse: Rift Points Cost: 5 This spell shoots energy which has been taken from the rift out of the casters hands. A stream of light, similar to lightning, but a bright grayish color mixed
